actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to repeal the special tax benefits provided during 1981 to Members of Congress and to provide for fair and equal taxation of Members of Congress.
short_title: Members of Congress Fairness and Equity Act of 1982

summary.text: Members of Congress Fairness and Equity Act of 1982 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to limit to $3,000 the amount of living expenses which Members of Congress may deduct from their incomes. Repeals the provision allowing such tax deduction without substantiation.

titles.title: Members of Congress Fairness and Equity Act of 1982
A bill to repeal the special tax benefits provided during 1981 to Members of Congress and to provide for fair and equal taxation of Members of Congress.
